divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the back steps smoking a cigeret and i always like to watch the birds or aircraft when i noticed an aircraft shaped object to the north it appeard strange because i couldnt see any wings ,tail or contrail useing my binocs i could see the object was long cylindricaland white with no windows it moved in an east to west path slowly for about 1 an half mins then it appeared to shrink into aball but it had changed direction to a northand south path for a min then it looked like it elongated but it had only changed direction again bac to the east west course it continued in that direction for about another min then it just disappeard no sign of it with or without the binocs
trends: There have been no other sightings in Natural Bridge Station
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: clear day spotted craft but didnt see anywing or tail used binocs got good look
